bannerMessage: Travel before 20 September and get 20% off!

intro.heading: Discover the Colombian Costa Caribe
intro.text: Hike through the breath-taking beauty of <2>Tayrona National Park</2>, discover the mysterious <4>Lost City</4>, or refresh yourself in the river of <6>Minca</6>. Our variety of heartful accommodations in the city of Santa Marta are <9>your perfect home base.</9>
